text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast
calm
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 48 in today's
episode I have a new idiom for you in
the nick of time
let's find out what it means and how you
can use it in your daily conversation in
the nick of time at some point of time
in your life you must have faced a
situation where you did something just
in time with a few seconds to spare or
before it was too late which in turn
saved you from unpleasant consequences
the idiom in the nick of time basically
means being able to get something done
just before the deadline when you do
something in the nick of time you are
doing it just before the time runs out
in other words you are doing it on the
exact moment so when you do something
just in time or before the time runs out
it means you have done your work in the
nick of time when a seriously ailing
patient is admitted in the hospital just
in time it means he reached the hospital
in the nick of time ruling out any
negative consequences alright now that
you know what this idiom means let's
take a look at some example sentences to
see how you can use it in your daily
conversation example 1 Maria got to the
station just in the nick of time and
jumped on the train as it was leaving
example till in spite of getting stuck
in the traffic we reached the airport in
the nick of time and made to our flight
example Three Little John was desperate
for a pee and got to the toilet just in
the nick of time example four Jenny got
her application form submitted to the
college in the nick of time if she had
arrived a day later she would have
missed the deadline example 5 Jack made
it to the fuel station in the nick of
time else he would have been stranded in
the middle of the highway without any
fuel example 6 Janet was almost drowning
in the swimming pool the lifeguard
spotted her and saved her in the nick of
time example 7 the bomb squad arrived in
the nick of time and defused the
explosives saving many innocent lives
example 8 William completed the
financial reports in the nick of time
before presenting them to the client he
had all the figures on the tip of his
tongue example 9 spider-man swept down
and saved the damsel in distress just in
the nick of time example 10 the doctors
decided to operate the injured man in
the nick of time to save his life
